main.model

Class Read

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.model.Read

  • public class Read
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a Read in a for the project suitable representation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int alignmentEnd
      The position at which the alignment of the read ends (with 1 being the first position).
      private int alignmentLength
      The length of the alignment.
      private int alignmentStart
      The position at which the alignment of the read starts (with 1 being the first position).
      private htsjdk.samtools.Cigar cigar
      The Cigar describing how the read aligns with the reference.
      private int mappingQuality
      The mapping quality of the read.
      private java.lang.String name
      The unique name of the read.
      private boolean negativeStrandFlag
      A boolean flag determining whether the read was reversely read off.
      private static java.util.Random random
      A Random generator for the definition of Read.createNewReadFromSAMRecord( ).
      private int randomID
      The unique, random identification number of the Read object.
      private static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> randomIDsAssigned
      A list of random read list numbers for assuring they are unique for each Read object.
      private java.lang.String sequence
      The sequence of the Read as stored in the BAM file (therefore, for example hard clipped bases are missing).

    • Field Detail

      • randomID

        private int randomID
        The unique, random identification number of the Read object.

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The unique name of the read.

      • alignmentStart

        private int alignmentStart
        The position at which the alignment of the read starts (with 1 being the first position).

      • alignmentEnd

        private int alignmentEnd
        The position at which the alignment of the read ends (with 1 being the first position).

      • alignmentLength

        private int alignmentLength
        The length of the alignment. I need to explicitly save this, because the reference sequence length is needed to compute a cross-border read's length. Instead of calling CircularParser.getReferenceSequenceLength( ) every time or adding a duplicate static reference sequence length attribute to the Read class, I prefer adding a length attribute which favours lower coupling of the classes.

        See the documentation of CircularParser.constructCrossBorderRead(main.model.Read, htsjdk.samtools.SAMRecord, boolean) to understand this problem better.

      • mappingQuality

        private int mappingQuality
        The mapping quality of the read.

      • negativeStrandFlag

        private boolean negativeStrandFlag
        A boolean flag determining whether the read was reversely read off.

      • sequence

        private java.lang.String sequence
        The sequence of the Read as stored in the BAM file (therefore, for example hard clipped bases are missing).

      • cigar

        private htsjdk.samtools.Cigar cigar
        The Cigar describing how the read aligns with the reference.

      • randomIDsAssigned

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> randomIDsAssigned
        A list of random read list numbers for assuring they are unique for each Read object.

      • random

        private static java.util.Random random
        A Random generator for the definition of Read.createNewReadFromSAMRecord( ).

      • Read

        private Read(int randomID,
             java.lang.String name,
             int alignmentStart,
             int alignmentEnd,
             int alignmentLength,
             int mappingQuality,
             boolean negativeStrandFlag,
             java.lang.String sequence,
             htsjdk.samtools.Cigar cigar)
        Creates a new Read.

        This method is private, because the static Read.createNewReadFromSAMRecord( ) should be used to create a Read object to ensure the random IDs are set properly.

        Parameters:
        randomID -
        name -
        alignmentStart -
        alignmentEnd -

      • isCrossBorder

        public boolean isCrossBorder()
        Checks whether the Read is cross-border and returns this information as a boolean.

        Take a look at the CircularParser.constructCrossBorderRead(main.model.Read, htsjdk.samtools.SAMRecord, boolean) method to get a better understanding of why this check does the desired.

        Returns:
        true if the Read is cross-border, false otherwise

      • unassignRandomNumber

        public static void unassignRandomNumber(java.lang.Integer randomNumberToUnassign)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Unassigns a random number such that it is free to be assigned to a different Read object again. This method should be called whenever a Read object is deleted singly. Because destructors are deprecated in Java, I prefer to use this method rather than a destructor.
        Parameters:
        randomNumberToUnassign - the random number to be unassigned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • resetRandomNumbers

        public static void resetRandomNumbers()
        Assings a new ArrayList to Read.readRandomNumbers, that is to say unassigns all random numbers.

        Should only be used if there is a 100% certainty that there are currently no Read objects saved anywhere, otherwise duplicate random IDs might be the consequence.

      • createNewReadFromSAMRecord

        public static Read createNewReadFromSAMRecord(htsjdk.samtools.SAMRecord record)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new Read object given a SAMRecord representation of the Read.
        Parameters:
        record -
        Returns:
        the Read representation of the read
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
